description: Structure of document that is submitted to the endpoint defined in a hook.

___before.description: Data before the request is processed.

___date.description: When was the request made, format=YYYYMMDD HHmmssSSSS in UTC

___clientId.description: Identifier (principal) for the client that made the request

___after.description: Data after the request is processed.
